messages.message:
Usability feedback in evaluating Ground Truth results:
It's not clear which value was the extracted value and what was in the GTs.

I've figured out that the red, crossed out text is the extracted value, but it required a deep investigation.  Ideally there would be some sort of label or tooltip that makes it easy to understand at a glance.

i hear you - btw this is documented here https://docs.instabase.com/apps/testing#viewing-accuracy-tests (see 3 in the screenshot)

but fyi @hannah @Jianqi Xing in case we want to make a UI improvement
Yes we've heard this! @Jianqi Xing perhaps we can pick this up as an office hours task?
